Account Officer Job at Zael Business Management & Consulting




        
    

        
        Zael consulting is basically a recruitment firm. We offer clients and candidates the confidence of specialist recruiters the have the depth and breath of experience across key sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Account Officerto join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing financial records, statutory remittances, and ensuring full tax compliance.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records and reports
	Handle LIRS-related filings, PAYE, withholding tax, and other statutory deductions
	Ensure timely remittance of taxes and statutory obligations
	Manage bank reconciliations, payment vouchers, and expense tracking
	Assist with budgeting, audits, and financial planning
	Liaise with tax authorities and external auditors when required
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards and company policies


Requirements


	HND / BSc in Accounting, Finance, or related field
	2–4 years of experience as an Account Officer
	Hands-on experience with LIRS and statutory compliance is mandatory
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax laws and accounting principles
	Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Excel
	High level of integrity, accuracy, and attention to detail


Salary
N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@zaelconsulting.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
